| Property     | Attribute     | Description           | Type                                                                                            | Default |
| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |

| `cardFooter` | `card-footer` | 页脚                    | `string`                                                                                        | `null`  |
| `cardHeader` | `card-header` | 页眉                    | `string`                                                                                        | `null`  |

| `direction`  | `direction`   | 文字方向：center居中；end：居右； | `"" \| "center" \| "end"`                                                                       | `null`  |
